creditline: Gift of Carol and Jeffrey Horvitz
description: cylindrical shaped vase with tapered base and shoulder; narrow mouth with slightly flared lip; overall green/gray glaze with irregular horizontal bands of reddish-brown; woven bamboo patterning; outer box and lid painted glossy black, with tan and gold tie; blond wood inner box and lid with tan/brown striped tie
inscription: lid verso: 織竹文花生; lid recto: 石黒宗麿作
medium: Stoneware with iron oxide over green ash glaze
title: Flower vase with woven bamboo pattern
